activities: Montage is a SaaS company and a provider of video interviewing solutions.  Our application allows candidates to showcase their skills and experience while giving hiring managers the ability to identify and differentiate top talent faster. Information provided may include resumes, work examples, references, certifications and awards.   Our live interviewing application allows candidates and hiring teams to connect from anywhere anytime, saving significant time and costs.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
